head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WIENER, HARVEY ALLAN.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WIENER, HARVEY ALLAN.

block.p: WIENER-Harvey Allan. Beloved husband of Phoebe, devoted and loving father of Shellie Wiener Geist (Alan) and Mardi McDougall (Peter), cherished grandfather of Lewis and William Geist. Services to be held on Thursday, October 19, 12 noon at Parkside Memorial Chapels, 98-60 Queens Boulevard, Forest Hills, New York.

WIENER-Harvey Allan. Beloved husband of Phoebe, devoted and loving father of Shellie Wiener Geist (Alan) and Mardi McDougall (Peter), cherished grandfather of Lewis and William Geist. Services to be held on Thursday, October 19, 12 noon at Parkside Memorial Chapels, 98-60 Queens Boulevard, Forest Hills, New York.
